00001 package newtonERP.module.generalEntity;

00007 import newtonERP.orm.Orm;
00008 import newtonERP.viewers.viewables.SelectBoxViewable;
00009 
00015 public class ListOfValue implements SelectBoxViewable
00016 {
00017         private String labelName;
00018         private AbstractOrmEntity sourceEntity;
00019         private AbstractOrmEntity foreignEntity;
00020 
00028         public ListOfValue(AbstractOrmEntity sourceEntity, String labelName,
00029                         AbstractOrmEntity foreignEntity)
00030         {
00031                 this.sourceEntity = sourceEntity;
00032                 this.labelName = labelName;
00033                 this.foreignEntity = foreignEntity;
00034         }
00035 
00036         public NaturalMap<String, String> getElements()
00037         {
00038                 // todo: correct deprecate
00039                 Vector<AbstractOrmEntity> entityList = Orm.select(foreignEntity, null);
00040 
00041                 NaturalMap<String, String> elementList = new NaturalMap<String, String>();
00042 
00043                 for (AbstractOrmEntity entity : entityList)
00044                 {
00045                         elementList.put(entity.getPrimaryKeyValue() + "",
00046                                         entity.getNaturalKeyDescription());
00047                 }
00048 
00049                 return elementList;
00050         }
00051 
00052         public String getLabelName()
00053         {
00054                 return labelName;
00055         }
00056 
00061         public String getForeignValue(String currentForeignPrimaryKey)
00062         {
00063                 try
00064                 {
00065                         Vector<String> criterias = new Vector<String>();
00066                         criterias.add(foreignEntity.getPrimaryKeyName() + "="
00067                                         + currentForeignPrimaryKey);
00068                         // todo: correct deprecate
00069                         Vector<AbstractOrmEntity> entityList = Orm.select(foreignEntity,
00070                                         criterias);
00071                         AbstractOrmEntity resultEntity = entityList.get(0);
00072 
00073                         return resultEntity.getNaturalKeyDescription();
00074                 } catch (Exception e)
00075                 {
00076                         return "- " + foreignEntity.getVisibleName() + " invalide - ";
00077                 }
00078         }
00079 
00083         public AbstractOrmEntity getForeignEntityDefinition()
00084         {
00085                 return foreignEntity;
00086         }
00087 
00091         public AbstractOrmEntity getSourceEntityDefinition()
00092         {
00093                 return sourceEntity;
00094         }
00095 
00100         public boolean equals(ListOfValue other)
00101         {
00102                 if (getForeignEntityDefinition().getSystemName().equals(
00103                                 other.getForeignEntityDefinition().getSystemName()))
00104                         if (getSourceEntityDefinition().getSystemName().equals(
00105                                         other.getSourceEntityDefinition().getSystemName()))
00106                                 if (getLabelName().equals(other.getLabelName()))
00107                                         return true;
00108                 return false;
00109         }
